system.description:
A 50’ length of rope with the power to entangle enemies.

  • Commanding: The owner can command the rope to entangle up to 8 human-sized creatures (or a number of larger or smaller creatures equivalent to 8 humans).

  • Range: Up to 20’ forward or 10’ up.

  • Saving throw: Each target may save versus spells to avoid being entangled.

  • Entangled creatures: Are fully restrained: unable to move, cast spells, or free themselves in any way.

  • Cutting the rope: It has AC –2 [21] and 22 hit points. If cut through, the rope becomes non-magical.

  • Regeneration: The rope repairs any damage to itself in 6 turns.
